article: the head of the u.n atomic agency on monday rejected iranian demands of an end to international scrutiny , saying tehran would remain in the spotlight as long as questions remained about its nuclear agenda .
abstract: chief nuclear inspector rejects iran 's call for an end to international scrutiny
